member.name: M:atcMwGisUtility.GisUtil.TabulateAreas(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Double[0:,0:]@)
member.summary: Given a grid and a polygon layer, calculate the area of each grid category within each polygon. Output array contains area of each grid category and polygon combination.
member.remark: This function can be accomplished in MapWindow by looping through each grid cell and counting the number of cells of each grid category within each feature. The MapWinGIS calls to use include the Grid Property Value, the GridHeader Properties dX, dY, XllCenter, and YllCenter, and the Shapefile Function PointInShapefile.

param.name: aGridLayerIndex
param.para: Index of grid layer containing values

param.name: aPolygonLayerIndex
param.para: Index of polgon layer to calculate areas for

param.name: aAreaGridPoly
param.para: 2-D Array used to store output areas

param.para: 2-D Array used to store output areas

member.name: M:atcMwGisUtility.GisUtil.TabulatePolygonAreas(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Given two polygon layers, calculate the area of each polygon of the first layer within each polygon of the second layer. Output array contains area of each polygon combination.

param.name: aPolygonLayer1Index
param.para: Index of first polygon layer to calculate areas for

param.name: aLayer1FieldIndex
param.para: Index of id field in first layer (eg land use code)

param.name: aPolygonLayer2Index
param.para: Index of second polygon layer to calculate areas for

member.returns: Array (one item per Polygon2 shape) of dictionaries (key is Layer1 field value, value is total area)
member.remarks: Added by Chris Wilson 11/24/2008 because original version required numeric entries in field

member.name: M:atcMwGisUtility.GisUtil.TabulateAreas(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.remark: This function can be accomplished in MapWindow by looping through each grid cell and counting the number of cells of each grid category within each feature. The MapWinGIS calls to use include the Grid Property Value, the GridHeader Properties dX, dY, XllCenter, and YllCenter, and the Shapefile Function PointInShapefile.

param.name: aGridLayerIndex
param.para: Index of grid layer containing values

param.name: aPolygonLayerIndex
param.para: Index of polygon layer to calculate areas for

member.returns: Sorted dictionary containing array of areas (key is grid value, value is array of total areas (one for each shape in basin))
member.remarks: Added by Chris Wilson 11/24/2008 to make consistent with TabulatePolygonAreas

member.name: F:atcMwGisUtility.GisUtil.Cancel
member.summary: Can be used to cancel long-running calcs
member.remarks: Caller can monitor some event and set this true to cancel routine

member.name: E:atcMwGisUtility.GisUtil.Progress
member.summary: Can be used to report progress in long-running routine when logger.progress is not enough

member.name: M:atcMwGisUtility.GisUtil.TabulateAreas(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Given a shapefile (landuse) and polygon (subbasin) layers, calculate the area of each landuse category within each subbasin polygon.
member.remark: This function can be accomplished in MapWindow by looping through each grid cell and counting the number of cells of each grid category within each feature. The MapWinGIS calls to use include the Grid Property Value, the GridHeader Properties dX, dY, XllCenter, and YllCenter, and the Shapefile Function PointInShapefile.
member.param: Name of field containing subbasin ID or Name
member.returns: Output is dictionary (key is polygon ID) of dictionaries (key is grid value, value is area).

member.name: M:atcMwGisUtility.GisUtil.TabulateAreas(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Given a grid (landuse) and polygon (subbasin) layers, calculate the area of each grid category within each polygon.
member.remark: This function can be accomplished in MapWindow by looping through each grid cell and counting the number of cells of each grid category within each feature. The MapWinGIS calls to use include the Grid Property Value, the GridHeader Properties dX, dY, XllCenter, and YllCenter, and the Shapefile Function PointInShapefile.
member.param: Name of field containing subbasin ID or Name
member.returns: Output is dictionary (key is polygon ID) of dictionaries (key is grid value, value is area).

member.name: M:atcMwGisUtility.GisUtil.UniqueValuesRenderer(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create unique color scheme for grid layer
member.remarks: Added by Chris Wilson 03/26/09 to provide capability for grid layers
